Articles.Content:
I think its getting a bit lost in that thread : http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/103657-Are-Kerbal-Scientists-Bugged

Summary: It seems Scientists aren't working at all. They give no bonus to maximum science (an experiment giving 8 science is always 8), maximum science per experiment (like Goo's giving 7 on first use, 0.7 on 2nd and 0.15 on third wether its a pilot or scientist) or on transfer rate.

Looks at least like no one in that thread, including myself, could find any situation where a scientist does something special.

I've been watching the other thread, but have been bogged down by other bugs at the moment (such as the ones that corrupt the save files). I see what you guys are saying, and I'll try to verify it soon-ish. I can't say that I dug too far into the scientists myself, so I don't have a good answer for you at the moment.

I'll try to see what I can find in the next day or two.

Cheers,

~Claw
